items.sentence: Tom certainly couldn\'t have succeeded without your help.
I think it\'s safe to assume Tom won\'t be here tomorrow.
Tom still doesn\'t know who\'s going to help him do that.
It wasn\'t until I heard him speak that I recognized him.
You\'d better not drink too much coffee so late at night.
Luckily, all the passengers were wearing their seatbelts.
Almost all of Tom\'s money goes to supporting his family.
I think Tom plays the bassoon just about as well as Mary.
Is your father easier to get along with than your mother?
It cost me three hundred dollars to have my car repaired.
